comment: So if had assassinated was it at the direction of Putin or is/was Putin at the direction of FSB/Kadyrov? Hmm
amr:
# ::snt So if had assassinated was it at the direction of Putin or is/was Putin at the direction of FSB/Kadyrov? Hmm
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / amr-choice
            :op1 (d / direct-01
                  :ARG1 (a2 / assassinate-01)
                  :ARG2 (p / person
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Putin")))
            :op2 (d2 / direct-01
                  :ARG1 (a3 / assassinate-01)
                  :ARG2 (s / slash
                        :op1 (g / government-organization
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "FSB"))
                        :op2 (p2 / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Kadyrov")))))
      :snt2 (h / hmm
            :mode expressive))

comment: US Embassy cables talk of an operation planned by "dissidents" in to "overthrow Putin".
amr:
# ::snt US Embassy cables talk of an operation planned by "dissidents" in to "overthrow Putin".
(t / talk-01
      :ARG0 (c / cable
            :source (e / embassy
                  :mod (c2 / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "US"))))
      :ARG1 (o / operate-01
            :ARG1-of (p / plan-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (d / diplomat))))
            :purpose (o2 / overthrow-01
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Putin")))))

comment: - A Sunni Muslim Russian/Chechen Ultranationalist w/ ties to the "United Russia" party(Putinism) & 's FSB(current KGB).
amr:
# ::snt - A Sunni Muslim Russian/Chechen Ultranationalist w/ ties to the "United Russia" party(Putinism) & 's FSB(current KGB).
(a / and
      :op1 (p / person
            :mod (r / religious-group
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Sunni"
                        :op2 "Muslim"))
            :mod (c / country
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Russia"))
            :mod (u / ultra)
            :ARG1-of (t / tie-01
                  :ARG2 (p2 / political-party
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "United"
                              :op2 "Russia"
                              :op3 "Party")
                        :ARG1-of (m / mean-01
                              :ARG2 (p3 / person
                                    :name (n4 / name
                                          :op1 "Putin"))))))
      :op2 (p4 / person
            :name (n5 / name
                  :op1 "amp"))
      :op3 (g / government-organization
            :name (n6 / name
                  :op1 "FSB")
            :poss (g2 / government-organization
                  :name (n7 / name
                        :op1 "KGB")
                  :mod (c2 / current))))
